segments.text: Those kids are going to get into trouble, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, completely focused on his goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there, waiting for her share, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They don't even notice the water overflowing from the sink, just like their mother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless they're being, right under their mother's nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip, and someone's going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mother is just standing there, drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting out a warning, but I know it's not my place.
segments.speaker: PAR
